meanings.definition: An uncultivated, uninhabited, and inhospitable region.
meanings.sent1: Explorers ventured into the wilds to discover new plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: The hiker got lost in the wilds of the forest.
meanings.sent3: The campers decided to pitch their tent in the wilds for an exciting adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast, uncharted wilds of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The wilds were filled with mystery and danger, waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: A state of nature; a state of disorder or chaos.
meanings.sent1: The town was thrown into the wilds after the storm destroyed homes and roads.
meanings.sent2: The classroom was in the wilds after the substitute teacher left.
meanings.sent3: The party turned into a wilds of dancing and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were a turbulent wilds of conflicting feelings.
meanings.sent5: The wilds of the city at night were both thrilling and intimidating.
